name: Frost Bound
description:
Frost Bound is an exploratory puzzle game in which you must try and escape the clutches of both the facility and the raging blizzard.

Controls

Simply use the arrow keys to move around, Z to interact, and hold X to check your inventory. Most inputs and settings are configurable in the generated settings.cfg file.
